#summary Try out the examples through Java Webstart

== Try the examples included in the API ==

  * [http://ardorlabs.se/ArdorCraftAPIExample/ArdorCraftAPIExampleSimple.jnlp SimpleGame] - Simplest example possible.
  * [http://ardorlabs.se/ArdorCraftAPIExample/ArdorCraftAPIExampleIntermediate.jnlp IntermediateGame] - Adding some more terrain generation, player collision and block editing.
  * [http://ardorlabs.se/ArdorCraftAPIExample/ArdorCraftAPIExampleReal.jnlp RealGame] - More involved terrain generation. Set various types of blocks. Change global lighting etc etc.
